jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Responsible for completed orders and Profit & Loss target achievement 
● Accountable for day-to-day operations (motorcycle driver-based service and car driver-based service) such as: -driver acquisition management (outreach, recruitment and onboarding) 
-driver empowerment management (loyalty & retention and safety & performance training)  
-driver exit management and inventory management (driver attributes and driver warrant) 
● Coordinate with Head of Regional Growth and VP Operations for day-to-day escalated issues around driver service and customer service 
● Learn from operations perspective during the process of establishing new area of service 
● Handle channel walk-in center in assigned area 
● Ensure problem solving according to agreed process & based on standard operational procedure 
● Manage drivers’ problems 
● Give empowerment to solve problems 
● Manage all districts and branches operations 
● Manage service time, driver, and customer satisfaction

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Have minimum  5 years experience in related area, preferably in managerial level
  • Holds a Bachelor’s degree from top university or abroad
  • Able to handle walk in channel
  • Expert in face to face service
  • Possess experience in service area (contact center, email, etc)
  • Willing to improve driver satisfaction
  • Willing to effectively manage headcount
  • Willing to be placed in several region in Indonesia (Sumatra, Kalimantan-Sulawesi, East Java & Bali, Central Java, West Java)
  • Possess fluency in Bahasa Indonesia and English
  • Have a good knowledge in marketing or related fields
  • Analytical, proactive, and a problem solver
